LanguageData.Milian_KnightHalberd.label: 骑士剑枪
LanguageData.Milian_KnightHalberd.description: 米莉安骑士的制式剑枪，需要依靠双手挥动，势大力沉。
LanguageData.Milian_KnightHalberd.tools.point.label: 刺
LanguageData.Milian_KnightHalberd.tools.blade.label: 刃
LanguageData.Milian_KnightHammer.label: 骑士锤
LanguageData.Milian_KnightHammer.description: 米莉安骑士的制式战锤，攻击时可以对目标造成眩晕。
LanguageData.Milian_KnightHammer.tools.hammer.label: 锤
LanguageData.Milian_KnightLance.label: 骑士骑枪
LanguageData.Milian_KnightLance.description: 米莉安骑士的制式骑枪，能够快速地发动高穿透的攻击。
LanguageData.Milian_KnightLance.tools.point.label: 刺
LanguageData.Milian_KnightSword.label: 骑士剑
LanguageData.Milian_KnightSword.description: 米莉安骑士的制式长剑，单手就能挥动。经常和盾牌配合使用。
LanguageData.Milian_KnightSword.tools.point.label: 尖
LanguageData.Milian_KnightSword.tools.edge.label: 边
